metadata.name: Exploring New Paradigms by Rocco Manta x NIDA
metadata.description:
Exploring New Paradigms

Visual artist: Rocco Manta  
Musician: NIDA

Dimensions: 1920 x 1080 px  
Codecs: MPEG-4 AAC, H.264  
Colour profile: HD (1-1-1)  
Duration: 00:33  
_

NFT collector’s right agreement:  
https://purple-patient-heron-156.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmfB9yxYBE86u8TJFN2vMtgHfLFM3NVLxdstnDvXX8Q29d?

_

Curated by: Cloud Seven & La Marée Haute  
NFT support: Thomas De Ben of A.P./Studio  
_

This NFT is created on the occasion of the event 'Art on the Blockchain: Exploring New Paradigms', curated by Cloud Seven & La Marée Haute  
in the context of Brussels Blockchain Week on the 5th of June 2023.  
_

'Art on the Blockchain: Exploring New Paradigms' program:

Panel with David Brognon & Stéphanie Rollin (artists), Thomas De Ben (digital art project manager), Olivier Marian (cofounder of Arteïa), and Njaheut Gilles Valler (visual artist and cryptocurrency investor).

Followed by a concert by NIDA and the creation of an NFT 
by Rocco Manta and NIDA.  
_

Rocco Manta: www.instagram.com/rockymanta  
NIDA: www.instagram.com/ka.nida  
Cloud Seven: www.cloudseven.be  
La Marée Haute: www.instagram.com/lmh.gram  
A.P./Studio: www.artistproof.be  
Brussels Blockchain Week: www.blockchainweek.be
